pointers: Handle terminal resize without crashing; ensure PTY child process gets the updated size.
Surface PTY spawn errors to the UI (toast/log) instead of failing silently.
Use xterm.js default keybindings; document deviations in the report.
Throttle write-to-terminal to avoid UI jank on large outputs.
Exclude obvious false positives via negative ripgrep rules (e.g., vendor directories).
Emit evidence spans as byte offsets and include a short 'reason' string per match.
